O

onAddPartCancelB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddPartController
This method changes scenes to the Mainform.
onAddPartSaveB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddPartController
This method saves the new part's data as either an InHouse or Outsourced part depending on the type of data entered.
onApAddB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductController
This method adds a selected part from the top table to the bottom table's ObservableList and displays it.
onApCancelB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductController
When called, this method takes the user back to the main menu without saving any changes made.
onApInhouseRB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddPartController
This method selects the InHouse radio button and sets the last text field to Machine id when called.
onApOutsourcedRB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddPartController
This method selects the Outsourced radio button and sets the last text field to Company name when called.
onApPartsSearch(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductController
This method searches through the parts list in the top table by name and id and displays the results.
onApSaveB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductController
This method saves the new product and its data to an ObservableList.
onExitB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainformController
This method exits the program when called.
onModifyPartCancelB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartController
When called, this method takes the user back to the main menu without saving any changes made.
onModifyPartSaveB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartController
This method grabs data from the text fields and updates a part with the new data.
onMpAddB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductController
This method adds a selected part from the top table to the bottom table's ObservableList and displays it.
onMpCancelB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductController
When called, this method takes the user back to the main menu without saving any changes made.
onMpInhouseRB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartController
This method selects the InHouse radio button and sets the last text field to Machine id when called.
onMpOutsourcedRB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartController
This method selects the Outsourced radio button and sets the last text field to Company name when called.
onMpPartsSearch(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductController
This method searches through the parts list in the top table by name and id and displays the results.
onMpSaveB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductController
This method saves the new product and its data to an ObservableList.
onPartsAddB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainformController
This method changes scenes to the AddPartForm.
onPartsDeleteB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainformController
This method deletes a selected part from the partsTable in the main menu.
onPartsModifyB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainformController
This method changes scenes to the ModifyPartForm and sends the data of the selected part to the ModifyPartForm.
onPartsSearch(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainformController
This method searches through the parts list by name and id and displays the results in the parts table.
onProductsAddB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainformController
This method switches scenes to the AddProductForm.
onProductsDeleteB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainformController
This method deletes a selected product with no associated parts from the productsTable in the main menu.
onProductsModifyB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainformController
This method changes scenes to the ModifyProductForm and sends the data of the selected product to the ModifyProductForm.
onProductsSearch(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainformController
This method searches through the products list by name and id and displays the results in the products table.
onRemoveApB1(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductController
This method removes the selected associated part from the bottom table and displays a pop-up confirmation box.
onRemoveApB2(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductController
This method removes the selected associated part from the bottom table and displays a pop-up confirmation box.
Outsourced - Class in model
 
Outsourced(int, String, double, int, int, int, String) - Constructor for class model.Outsourced
This method is a constructor that takes in Outsourced data with a company name.
